name: .The Heart of the Woods.
description:
(Cancelled but finished... for now)

!Please note we are not affiliated with nor have any relations to the official creators of "Over the Garden wall"!

"The Heart of the Woods" is a black and white "Over The Garden Wall" fan game following two sisters, Lilly and Sasha, and their adventures into the unknown!

Thank you to::

BadMustard, for cleaning up my horrible coding!

my friend Dani, for doing the art!

and myself for knowing when to quit

Characters ownership:: 

Lilly, Father Ryder, Herbert (c) Dani 

Sasha, Zulia (c) Kamryn "Jeane" B.

 also since this game is canceled there may be a few bugs here and there, nothing game-breaking but still...
